title: Ranking of languages spoken at home in the U.S. 2018
summary: The Ranking languages Language in the home U.S. was Language Tagalog_(incl._Filipino) , who made 41460427 speakers .
The most languages Language was Arabic , with just 874314 speakers .

In second place was Language Chinese_(incl._Mandarin_Cantonese) with 3471604 speakers ; third place went to Language Spanish with 41460427 speakers ; fourth place went to Language Hindi with 874314 speakers and fifth place went to Language Vietnamese , who was 1542473 speakers .
gold: This graph shows the top 10 spoken languages other than English in the United States . In 2018 , around 41.5 million people in the U.S. spoke Spanish at home . The distribution of the U.S. population by ethnicity can be accessed here .
